revision.text:
{{Infobox Character | title = | image = | caption = | type = NPC | setting = Aramán | actor = Brennan Lee Mulligan | class = | species = | name = | pronouns = she/her | characterTitles = {{Plainlist| * Photarch * Scion of the Candescent Creed }} | AKA = Grandmother (members of [[House Halovar]]){{Ep ref|ep=4x1|1:27:14}} | age = | languages = | place = | family = [[House Halovar]] | partner = | children = [[Godard Halovar]] (son) | profession = | affiliations = [[Candescent Creed]] (founder) | status = | deathReason = | statsArray1 = {{Infobox Character/stats| | system = d&d | creatureType = | background = | alignment = | level = | HP = | AC = | DC = | str = | dex = | con = | int = | wis = | cha = | statsRef = }} | first = {{ep|4x01}} | last = | stream = [[Campaign 4]] (3 episodes) | television = | comic = | other = }} '''Yanessa Halovar'''Yanessa was first identified in the [https://critrole.com/critical-recap-critical-role-c4e01-the-fall-of-thjazi-fang/ episode 1 recap]. is the grandmother of [[Wicander Halovar]] and leader of [[House Halovar]]. She is also the Photarch and Scion of the [[Candescent Creed]]. As a [[non-player character]] in [[Campaign 4]], she is played by [[Brennan Lee Mulligan]]. == Description == Yanessa is an elderly woman dressed in white.{{Ep ref|ep=4x1|13:25}} === Personality === She projects a young and self-assured image to the public, but is much more vulgar and casual with her family, cursing her old age and occasionally the attitude of the demons in addition to calling [[Wicander Halovar]] "little Wicky" and [[Tyranny]] "lovey".{{Ep ref|ep=4x1|1:30:54}} == Biography == ===Before Campaign 4=== Yanessa was born to House Halovar prior to the events of the [[Shapers' War]]. Her family served as priests to [[Tansul]], the god of the sun, and were considered to be the right hand of the Obridimian royal house. As a young girl, she lived through the fall of the gods and the heart of the Obridimian Empire being cast into eternal darkness. The Halovars survived being deposed by becoming a merchant company in order to restore their family's name and status. At some point afterwards, Yanessa came across the [[celestial]], [[Aetheon]], and secured it beneath [[Villa Aurora]]. She took Aetheon's blood and used it to power a ''Wish'' spell in order to conceive a [[Godard Halovar|child]].{{Ep ref|ep=4x03|23:57|29:44}} Her descendants wield divine power in various forms.{{Ep ref|ep=4x2|4:29:07}} Three years before the events of {{ep|4x01}}, Yanessa founded the [[Candescent Creed]]. ===[[Campaign 4]]=== Yanessa announces the execution of [[Thjazi Fang]] ordered by the [[Lords Advisory]]. Her and her son dismiss her [[Wicander Halovar|grandson]]'s pleas to commute Thjazi's sentence.{{Ep ref|ep=4x1|1:32:05}} == Character information == == Appearances and mentions == * [[Campaign 4]] ** {{appearance|4x01|appear|{{1st}}}} ** {{appearance|4x02|appear}} ** {{appearance|4x03|appear}} == Quotations == * '''Yanessa''': ''(At the execution of [[Thjazi Fang]])'' You have my utmost faith, my grandson. You are the future of the House of Halovar.
'''[[Wick]]''': I am?
'''Yanessa''': He's got to die.
'''Wick''': I'm sorry?
'''Yanessa''': He's dying. We'll talk more later.{{ep ref|1:32:05|ep=4x01}} * '''Wick''': I'm sorry, the Filament is that creature's blood?
'''Yanessa''': No, no, no, Wicky.
'''Wick''': Oh.
'''Yanessa''': It ain't got blood. It is Light, you know, but it's in his body, yeah, but it's also his spit. You know, it's hard to say. It is Light. It's just, it's just what he's made of, innit?
'''Wick''': It's not the distilled liquid of the universe?
'''Yanessa''': ''(sighs)''
'''Wick''': We've been drinking this from the Radiant Chalice. We've been tattooing it on my body.
'''Yanessa''': Many people's bodies, yeah. A lot of bodies.{{ep ref|23:11|ep=4x03}} * '''Yanessa''': If you can't be an empire, you take your licks, you pick yourself up, and you start a church or a merchant company.{{ep ref|30:14|ep=4x03}} * '''Yanessa''': The things that we say in the Creed, it's good rules. You write down these rules because you know that people you don't know are going to read them, and you want there to be something that makes the ground under your feet steady. You need some reliability, right? It's sort of like:
There's a lake with fish in it, and it's good fish, but it's not yours, it's the king's, and you want to poach those fish, yeah? But if everybody does it, it'd be all out of fish because that's why the rule's there, so the ideal situation is only you poach the fish so you get your fish, but nobody else does because they believe in the rule that you shouldn't do that.{{ep ref|33:23|ep=4x03}} * '''[[Tyranny]]''': I was wondering if I might go draw [Wick] a hot bath so he can decompress and think about his next steps.
'''Yanessa''': What a thoughtful demon you are. That sounds lovely. Now, not as hot as you'd like it, otherwise my little grandson will get burned.
'''Tyranny''': Don't want to cook him.
'''Yanessa''': Ah, a boiled grandson!
'''Tyranny''': ''(laughs)''
'''Wick''': Oh, that would not be good.{{ep ref|37:27|ep=4x03}} == Trivia == == References == {{Reflist}} {{Art reflist}} [[Category:Aramán non-player characters]]
